text: I Am a Fugitive from a Chain Gang is a 1932 American crime drama movie directed by Mervyn LeRoy and was based on the autobiography by Robert Elliott Burns. It stars Paul Muni, Glenda Farrell, Helen Vinson, Noel Francis, Preston Foster, Allen Jenkins, Berton Churchill, Sally Blane and was distributed by Warner Bros. Pictures. It was nominated for 3 Academy Awards in 1934. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1932 crime drama movies Category:1930s American crime drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Mervyn LeRoy
title: I Am a Fugitive from a Chain Gang
